casename: Lau Ah Lang and Others v Chan Huang Seng and Others
counsel: K Shanmugam SC, Christopher Daniel and Sanjiv Rajan (Allen & Gledhill) for the plaintiffs; Edwin Tay and Claire Nazar (Edwin Tay & Co) for the defendants
tags: Unincorporated Associations and Trade Unions/Friendly societies/Meetings
tags-parsed: Unincorporated Associations and Trade Unions/Friendly societies/Meetings/Notice of extraordinary general meeting given to all members including plaintiffs/Removal of management committee and election of replacement committee/No mention of such actions in notice/Sufficiency of notice/Validity of actions taken at meeting.
